welcome.title: Welcome to the Note Crafter!
welcome.description: Would you like a quick tour to learn about the main features?

steps.title: Meeting Input
steps.description: Start by entering your meeting title, agenda, and transcript. Don't worry if you don't have an agenda - we can extract it automatically from the transcript!

steps.title: Generation Controls
steps.description: Customize how your notes are generated. You can focus on specific departments, adjust the tone, and enable features like Meeting Coach for improvement insights.

steps.title: Meeting Presets
steps.description: Save time with presets! Choose from templates like 'Client Update' or 'Executive Brief' that automatically configure controls for common meeting types.

steps.title: Generate Notes
steps.description: Once you've entered your transcript and set your preferences, click 'Generate Notes' to create structured meeting minutes with action items and RAG status.

steps.title: Output Panel
steps.description: Your generated notes appear here with workstream sections, action items, and status indicators. Scroll through to review all the extracted insights.

steps.title: Export Options
steps.description: Share your notes easily! Export to CSV for tracking in spreadsheets, PDF for documentation, or copy to clipboard for quick sharing.

steps.title: Interrogate Transcript
steps.description: Want more details? Use this feature to ask follow-up questions about the meeting. The AI will answer based on the transcript and suggest related questions.

steps.title: Meeting Coach
steps.description: When enabled, Meeting Coach provides feedback on meeting effectiveness - like agenda coverage, action item clarity, and participation balance. Great for improving your team's meeting culture!

steps.title: Settings & Help
steps.description: Access settings to configure your Bot ID and preferences. The help menu provides detailed guidance on all features. You can replay this tour anytime from the menu.

completion.title: You're All Set!
completion.description: You now know the basics of the Meeting Notes Generator. Start by pasting a transcript and generating your first set of notes. Happy meeting!

step1.title: Welcome to the Note Crafter!
step1.content: This tour will walk you through the key features. Let's get started.

step2.title: Two Ways to Input
step2.content: You can either select a meeting from your calendar or manually paste a transcript. The 'Select Meeting' tab is the recommended approach.

step3.title: Calendar Picker
step3.content: Browse meetings by week. You can see how many meetings you have each day at a glance.

step4.title: Today Button
step4.content: Click this button to quickly jump to today's meetings.

step5.title: Week Navigation
step5.content: Use these arrows to browse previous or upcoming weeks to find the meeting you want to process.

step6.title: Meeting List
step6.content: All meetings for the selected day appear here. You can see details like time, attendees, and transcript availability.

step7.title: Transcript Status
step7.content: Each meeting shows a badge indicating whether a transcript is available (green), still processing (yellow), or not available (gray).

step8.title: Expand to Preview
step8.content: Click on any meeting card to expand it and view the list of attendees before processing.

step9.title: Process This Meeting
step9.content: Once you've selected the right meeting, click this button to automatically load the transcript, agenda, and participant information.

step10.title: View Participants
step10.content: After processing, you can view all participants here. Click to see contact options like email or Teams messaging.

step11.title: View Transcript
step11.content: Access the full meeting transcript here. You can download it or use the 'Interrogate' feature to ask questions about specific content.

step12.title: Manual Input Option
step12.content: If you prefer, you can also manually paste a transcript using this tab. This is useful for meetings outside your calendar or for demo purposes.

step13.title: Use Sample Data
step13.content: For this tour, we'll load some sample data to see how it works.

step14.title: 2. Select a Preset
step14.content: Presets are the fastest way to configure your notes. Let's look at a few common meeting types.

step15.title: Preset: Client Update
step15.content: This preset is optimized for external meetings. It uses a client-ready tone and redacts personal info.

step16.title: Preset: Internal Sync
step16.content: Ideal for team check-ins. This preset uses a more detailed, professional tone and enables the critical review.

step17.title: Preset: Brainstorm
step17.content: Use this for creative sessions. It generates concise notes and helps identify emerging themes and actions.

step18.title: Preset: Executive Briefing
step18.content: Creates a high-level summary with a concise tone, perfect for leadership updates.

step19.title: 3. Generate Notes
step19.content: When you're ready, click here. For the tour, we'll instantly show a sample result.

step20.title: 4. Review Your Output
step20.content: Here are your structured, professional notes. Let's look at the key sections.

step21.title: Workstream Notes
step21.content: The agent organizes the transcript into sections based on your agenda, extracting key points, decisions, and risks.

step22.title: Next Steps
step22.content: All next steps are automatically extracted into a clear, organized table with owners, due dates, and a RAG status.

step23.title: Critical Review
step23.content: This section (enabled by some presets) analyzes gaps, risks, and unassigned tasks.

step24.title: Meeting Coach
step24.content: Get AI-powered feedback on your meeting's effectiveness. This is for you only and won't be exported.

step25.title: 5. Export Your Notes
step25.content: Easily copy, download as a PDF, or draft an email with your generated notes.

step26.title: 6. Interrogate Transcript
step26.content: Have a specific question? Use this feature to chat with an AI agent that knows the content of your transcript.

step27.title: Ask Anything
step27.content: You can ask for summaries, key decisions, or who was responsible for certain tasks. The agent will answer based only on the provided transcript.

step28.title: Fine-Tuning the Output
step28.content: Next, we'll explore advanced settings to tailor your output. The form has been cleared, and we're back at the top to continue.

step29.title: Show Advanced Settings
step29.content: Each preset is just a combination of these advanced settings. Let's open the panel to see them.

step30.title: Advanced Settings Panel
step30.content: Here you can manually control every aspect of the output.

step31.title: Dynamic Settings
step31.content: Watch how the settings in this panel change when we select the 'Client Update' preset. Note the 'Redact PII' and 'Client-Ready' tone.

step32.title: Dynamic Settings
step32.content: Now let's try 'Internal Sync'. It enables the 'Critical Lens' and uses icons for better readability.

step33.title: Context Tags
step33.content: Apply tags like "Sensitive" or "Client facing" to give the AI important context about the meeting content.

step34.title: Department Focus
step34.content: Select one or more departments to have the AI prioritize their related discussions and action items in the summary.

step35.title: Audience
step35.content: Tailor the summary's level of detail. 'Executive' is high-level, while 'Department' is more granular.

step36.title: Tone
step36.content: Adjust the writing style of the notes, from professional to concise or polished for clients.

step37.title: View Mode
step37.content: Choose between the full, detailed minutes or a version that shows only the action items.

step38.title: Formatting Toggles
step38.content: Use these switches to enable the Critical Lens, redact personal info (PII), add icons, or bold important keywords.

step39.title: Meeting Coach Settings
step39.content: You can disable the Meeting Coach or change its feedback style from supportive ("Gentle") to more direct.

step40.title: You're All Set!
step40.content: That covers all the features. You can replay this tour any time from this menu by clicking "Replay Tutorial".
